title: T206 Sale ++ High Grade ++ PSA 4-7 ++ American Beauty
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: T206 Sale ++ High Grade ++ PSA 4-7 ++ American Beauty
posts.post_content:
Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for scans, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.
4 – Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine.
5 – Free S/H
6 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.

Freshly graded.  Scans upon request.

Some very nice ABs.  Most of which are highest grade.

Back ground color key:  White = AB 350 with frame;  Yellow = AB 350 no frame;  Blue = AB 460; Pink = HOF/"special"

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=340089&d=1547058901[/IMG]

I did a count of PSA 7 AB 350 with frame, and came up with 8 graded.  Even if I missed a couple, it is reasonable to say only around 10 are graded at PSA 7.

A few examples:

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=340090&d=1547059019[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=340091&d=1547059056[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=340092&d=1547059067[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=340093&d=1547059075[/IMG]

Thanks, Scott

Hey Scott,
    I’ll take Pseister, Steet, Willetts, and Stahl.

      Lmk thanks Brian
